entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
